title: Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit | 25 Guided STEM Experiment Lessons | 48 Page Color Student Guide | Grades 3-6 | Ages 8+ | Play & Learn | Parents' Choice Silver Award Winner
descriptions:
**Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit**

**Award-Winning STEM Education for Kids Ages 8+**

Introduce your child to the fascinating world of motors and generators with this comprehensive science kit from Thames & Kosmos. Designed for kids in grades 3-6, this kit offers a fun and interactive way to learn about electric motors, generators, and the principles of magnetic fields and electric current.

**Key Features:**

* Electric motor with transparent plastic casing for a clear view of its inner workings
* Battery-powered motor operation and reconfigurable to hand-crank electric generator
* Explore magnetic fields and electric current through 25 guided experiments
* 48-page full-color student guide and 60-page full-color manual provide detailed instructions and explanations
* Develops understanding of electric motor function, electric generator function, and energy conversion (kinetic to electrical and electrical to kinetic)

**Components and Experiments:**

* Motor made of transparent plastic
* Configurable to battery-powered motor or hand-crank electric generator
* Experiment with magnets, build simple circuits, and learn about gears and drive-trains
* Develop problem-solving skills and critical thinking through hands-on activities

**Awards and Recognition:**

* Winner of the Parents' Choice Silver Award

**Product Specifications:**

* Dimensions: 13.1 x 8.9 x 2.6 inches (H x W x D)
* Weight: 1.3 pounds
* Recommended for kids aged 8 and above
* Ideal for homeschooling, science fair projects, or simply encouraging a love of STEM education

**Order Your Thames & Kosmos Motors & Generators Science Kit Today!**

Give your child the gift of scientific discovery and exploration with this engaging and educational science kit. Order now and watch them develop a deeper understanding of the fascinating world of motors and generators!
